text: Mike Rounds (born October 24, 1954) is the junior United States Senator from South Dakota. He is a member of the U.S. Republican Party and has been in Senate since January 3, 2015. Rounds was born on October 24, 1954 in Huron, South Dakota. He graduated from the South Dakota State University. He was married to Jean Vedvei from 1978 until her death in 2021. They have four children. In February 15, 2018 Mike Round interview with Martha MacCallum on Fox News channel, he said about a bipartisan Immigration fail to move forward in the Senate. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mike Rounds, U.S. Senator for South Dakota, Home Page Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from South Dakota Category:United States senators from South Dakota Category:Governors of South Dakota
title: Mike Rounds
